ExceptionMessages.Message: The uploaded image file size exceeds the allowed limit.
The specified clinic is invalid or does not exist.
The specified department is invalid or does not exist.
The provided date of birth is invalid.
The provided doctor's address is invalid or does not match the clinic's location.
The doctor's schedule contains invalid or conflicting details.
The provided email address is invalid.
The uploaded image file type is not supported.
The provided name contains invalid characters or is in an incorrect format.
The provided page number is invalid.
The provided page size is invalid.
The provided phone number is invalid.
The provided time is invalid or conflicts with an existing schedule.
